text: (napiye! Manitarkalai) matinutpattaik kontum, alakana nallupatecattaik kontume umatu iraivanutaiya valiyin pakkam alaippiraka! Melum, avarkalutan (tarkkikka nerittal) (kanniyamana) alakana muraiyil tarkkam ceyviraka. Umatu iraivanutaiya valiyiliruntu vali tavariyavarkal evarkal enpatai niccayamaka avantan nankarivan. Nerana valiyiliruppavarkal yar enpataiyum avantan nankarivan
